name: Buildernet
description: Buildernet is an MEV-focused Layer 2 solution designed to optimize transaction ordering and maximize value extraction opportunities. Operators run sequencers that efficiently order transactions while capturing MEV rewards. The protocol aims to create a more efficient and profitable environment for both users and operators in the MEV landscape.

docsIntegration.text: Buildernet sequencer documentation covers MEV extraction strategies and optimal transaction ordering
MEV toolkit includes flash loan interfaces, arbitrage detection APIs, and profit optimization algorithms
